title: Basil, Chamal, Namal and Shasheendra say no to ministerial posts in new govt
body_lines: Several prominent former ministers and a state minister have decided not to take up any ministerial posts in any future government, sources said.
Accordingly, it is reported that former ministers Basil Rajapaksa, Namal Rajapaksa, Chamal Rajapaksa and state minister Shasheendra Rajapaksa have personally taken this decision.
